name: Opcode-Powered Shuttle
description:
Note: This is currently not much more than a prototype made in about 30 hours.

You have a shuttle with damaged controls, but you can still enter 3-bit opcodes to fly it manually. Using 1's and 0's, pilot your vessel, and work to salvage and upgrade it.

  • What works: Movement, targeting, warp.
  • What doesn't: Communications, scanning, weapons.

Right now, it's the skeleton of a space exploration game. In the future, it will hopefully become an empire-building space-traveling game.

Source on GitHub | Vote on Ludum Dare!
